Radha and Chelladurai are close friends and are a virtually invincible duo that lives carefree, roaming around their village and settling differences with others the rough way. Things take a bad turn when Chelladurai's romance with Vandhana reaches the ears of her brother. Heated confrontations result in the unexpected death of Vandhana's brother. The repercussions of the incident are felt by Radha and Chelladurai and the fate suffered by their friendship and their lives, forms the rest of the story.::PipingHotViews
